pr_title: Adapt docs to non deprecated way of setting --memory and --memory-swap

timeline.message: Adapt to non deprecated way of setting --memory and --memory-swap

timeline.bodyText:
this is incorrect.
It should be -> cmd.withHostConfig(cmd.getHostConfig().withMemory((long) 8 * 1024 * 1024))-like.
Otherwise, you're overwriting the previously set host values
timeline.author: bsideup
